main_definition: Persistent in requiring or expecting something from someone, often to a high standard.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expects a lot of effort and attention
meanings_and_examples.example: The boss is very demanding when it comes to meeting deadlines.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Has high standards or requirements for something
meanings_and_examples.example: She demands perfection in all her work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Insisting on something, often with a sense of authority or entitlement
meanings_and_examples.example: The customer is demanding that the company replace their faulty product immediately.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Tends to be critical and difficult to please
meanings_and_examples.example: My new puppy can be quite demanding, always wanting attention and playtime.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Requiring a lot of time, effort or resources
meanings_and_examples.example: The project is very demanding in terms of the amount of research needed to complete it.
